title.rendered: “Inside the IDF’s Intense 24-Hours: Overcoming 25 Terror Targets and Ongoing Operations in Khan Younis”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In the past day, Air Force fighter jets have attacked over 25 terror targets, including weapon storage facilities and other terror infrastructures.
Soldiers from the 98th division continue to battle in Khan Younis, eliminating terrorists and destroying weapon storage facilities.
The combat team of the Commando Brigade eliminated a number of terrorists in the past day using precise shooting, among other methods, by sniper fire.
Combat team fighters from the 7th Brigade eliminated terrorist cells in the Kfar Darom area of Khan Younis, as part of joint operations with the Air Force, with aircraft attacking a number of terrorists from the air and a weapons storage facility.

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activities: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC02042024.15156156

Attached is documentation from IDF’s attacks in the strip: https://bit.ly/3VCSdf5
